name: Michael Jackson - Thriller
description:
Razor blades are my paint brush and Candy Wrappers are my paints. 
My technique is to utilize cut candy wrappers on canvas to give 
representational form, color, light and movement to my images.

Candy Wrapper Collage series in Pop Art style. All collages 
created entirely of Candy Wrappers.
Homage to the late great Michael Jackson. Thriller.
